title: is there any discrimination between management students and merit students?

comments.body:
No. In my experience the worst enemy that management students have is themselves. I haven't met a single non-management person in both campuses who gave a flying fuck. 

Don't get demotivated that you didn't do good in 12th, it doesn't mean you won't do good in college. 

College is a completely new thing, though the people who did well before tend to continue doing well in college i have seen so many people who turn their lives around. For better or for worse. 

Just make sure that you do it for the better
No one will know you are management unless you tell them. Also no one really cares at the end of the day
No one cares. I have several friends from management quota, a lot of them are smart but were just unlucky with competitive exams.

Yes full fight anol bro

Lol, no very chill it is
Unless u tell no one will even know
Nobody gives a fck honestly,infact nobody would even know unless you tell them. So forget the past and start performing from now
It's not all sunshine and rainbows.most of em don't buy there are some
